text_injector.name: Text Injector
text_injector.description: A file writer plugin that allows users to insert formatted text at a specific location in a target file, based on a search string and customizable offset.

file_saver.name: File Saver
file_saver.description: Creates text files in specified folders, using transcribed text as filenames and a template file for the contents.

intent_sender.name: Intent Sender
intent_sender.description: Sends arbitrary Android intents with customizable package name, class name, and action, including text as an extra, enabling integration with Tasker or other automation apps.
